title: 3BR Townhome, Great Amenities, Washer/Dryer in Unit, Private Garage!
map_address: 1-24 Forest Glen Street near Sierra Vista
posting_body: ['🌲 Forest Glen Apartments 🏡', '🐕', 'Pet Friendly', '🐈', '📍 Location:', '1 Forest Glen Street, Mountain View, CA 94043', 'Townhome for Rent:', '3 Bedrooms - 2.5 Bathrooms - 1225 Square Feet', 'Rental Rate:', '$5185', 'Available Now❗', '📞 Call us today to schedule a tour.', '📆', 'show contact info', 'Description:', 'Luxury Living in Downtown Mountain View', 'Three bedroom Mountain View townhomes to rent – in a serene cul-de-sac less than two miles from the San Antonio Caltrain stop and everything else – is rare.', 'Even more, our homes are completely renovated with wood plank flooring, new appliances (including washer/dryer), and top-of-the-line finishes.', 'Parking is effortless with private, direct-access garages.', 'Quick and Easy Access to Caltrain', 'Just down the street from the Mountain View Caltrain Station, you can spend your weekends exploring all the Peninsula has to offer.', 'Or, if you’d rather stay local, stop by Rengstorff Park Pool for refreshing water time before grabbing dinner at Taqueria La Bamba.', 'Property Amenities:', '➪ Newly Renovated', '➪ Stainless Steel Appliances', '➪ Washer and Dryer', '➪ Quartz Countertops', '➪', 'Moveable Kitchen Island', '➪ Glass Shower with Waterfall Showerhead', '➪ Private Terraces and Balconies', '➪ Private Garage', '👉 Call to schedule your tour at', 'show contact info', '.', 'Leasing Office located at', '600 N Whisman, MV 94043', 'Office Hours:', 'M-F 9-5, Sat/Sun by appt only.', 'Professionally Managed By: BLVD Residential || <URL>']
